title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 508.3 - Eligibility
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 508.3 - Eligibility

State Regulations

An owner is eligible for a program incentive, if: (a) a complete application for a request for
a program incentive has been received by the authority with respect to a
residential building with qualified occupied square footage, in accordance with
the procedure prescribed by section
508.9
of this Part; and
(b) the residential building: (1)
is a new residential building that: (i) has completed construction for purposes
of receiving; and
(ii)
has received
a certificate of occupancy on or after January 1, 2010, but before October 31, 2013; or
(2)
is an
existing residential building that: (i) has
completed substantial renovation; and
(ii)
has received a certificate of occupancy
or certificate of completion, or other documentation issued by the State or a
municipality indicating that construction is complete, on or after January 1, 2010, but before October 31, 2013. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
508.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
